title: What Do You Do, Dear? Proper Conduct for All Occasions
description: What do you do when:...a lady polar bear walks into your igloo in a white fur coat?...the lady you are forcing to walk the plank drops her handkerchief?...you meet someone coming the other way on a circus tightrope?This is the funniest book on good behavior you'll ever read!
author: Sesyle Joslin
